column1: # NOTE - Every component is assumed to have name and description so they do not need to be included here
# If a property does not have a propertyConfigFileLabel it is assumed that the property will not be environment specific i.e. not spring injected

column5: defaultValue - dataType must be string or on object that support Object.value(String)

column6: The name of the class that will contain the custom code.
The fully qualified type the the converter will take as input, it can be any String or class that implements Object valueOf(String)
The fully qualified type that the converter will create, it can be any String or class that implements Object valueOf(String)
